DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : HONG KONG
DOC.TEXT: Airport Financing Expected to Dominate Budget : The colony ' s annual budget statement is likely to be dominated by attempts to resolve the Sino-British dispute over Hong Kong ' s $ 20-billion airport project , tax experts say . China and Britain have been haggling over how to pay_for the project , which includes new roads , railways and bridges , tunnels and major reclamation work_on Hong Kong ' s Victoria Harbor . Beijing is concerned that Hong Kong , which reverts to Chinese sovereignty in 1997 , will be left with a large debt burden as a result of the project .
